title: Presentation Components
displayTitle: A recent history of modelling in government
body: Modelling is essential to the work of government. From predicting the spread of pandemic flu to forecasting population growth, models underpin decisions which affect people’s lives. It is vital, therefore, that these models are fit-for-purpose.
instruction: Scroll down to see the recent history of the modelling

title: Question Components
body: Discover what question components are available within the framework, along with some tips on how to use them.
pageBody:
Without a range of question components, we can’t easily measure if learners are meeting the intended course objectives, provide guidance and feedback if they’re not, or give them opportunities to practise in a ‘safe environment’.

Discover what question components are available within the framework, along with some tips on how to use them.
instruction: Scroll down to see what question components are available as part of the v5 core bundle.
